public interface AttributedTagInterface

Interface of a tag that can have attributes.

Oleg MÃ¼rk

static final String ATTRIBUTED_TAG_KEY

Constant Field Values
Method Detail

addAttribute

void addAttribute(String name,
                  String value)
The method to add an attribute to the tag marked with this interface. When the tag already has an attribute with the same name, it will get the value, which is provided last.

Once an attribute is added, it cannot be removed. However, when an attribute has a null, empty, or blank string value, it won't be rendered.

Parameters:
name - The name for the attribute to add.
value - The value for the attribute to add.
